title: Performance & SLA Targets
subtitle: Service Level Objectives — Latency, Availability, and Responsiveness Metrics

metrics.notes: Configurable via Settings (3s–15s). Production target aligned with sensor telemetry cadence.
Measured from navigation start to first contentful paint. Static asset serving via Vercel CDN.
95th percentile under simulated concurrent user load. Excludes initial cold start.
All user interactions (navigation, filters, toggles) respond within perceptible threshold.
Production uptime SLA. Demo environment hosted on Vercel with automatic failover.
End-to-end model inference including feature extraction. Production target per Appendix A.
Minimum operational camera percentage before degraded mode alert triggers.
All ingested snapshots must pass runtime schema validation. Failures trigger governance alerts.

disclaimers: Demo metrics are simulated from static data; production targets are defined in the operational SLA agreement.
Performance measurements reflect Vercel-hosted static frontend. Production architecture may introduce additional latency from live data pipelines.
Uptime target applies to production deployment with redundancy; demo environment does not carry SLA obligations.
